{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Comtrend |model=VG-8050 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date=04/2015 |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM63169 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30LF1G08AA |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM68C16CWQE |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, Mini PCIe |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM63169 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53125 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux;2.6.30; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Comtrend_XXXX |default_ssid_regex=^Comtrend_[A-F0-9]{4}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=F8:8E:85 |oui_eth=F8:8E:85 }} {{TagLine|Wireless VoIP Gateway Router}} :[http://www.comtrend.com/links/124$product.htm Product page] (VG-8040un) "50XX13-272" and a date code of '''1514''' (April 2015) :is silkscreened on the board in the photos. *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/comtrend/vg8050 ''Comtrend VG-8050'' on '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] 
System-On-Chip:	Broadcom BCM63169 SoC
CPU/Speed:	BMIPS4350 v8.0 (400MHz)
NAND:	        128 MiB (MX30LF1G08AA)
RAM:	        128 MiB DDR2 (EM68C16CWQE)
Wireless:	BCM6362 (14e4:6362) 802.11bgn (SoC)
Ethernet:	Broadcom BCM53125
USB:		Yes* (mod)
Power adapter:	12V DC 2A / I.T.E. AMS4-1202000FV

CFE version 1.0.38-112.70-15 for BCM963268 (32bit,SP,BE)
Build Date: 2013-02-25 18:55:44 (dylan@rd7-server)
Copyright (C) 2000-2011 Broadcom Corporation.

NAND flash device: name, id 0xc2f1 block 128KB size 131072KB
Chip ID: BCM63169D0, MIPS: 400MHz, DDR: 400MHz, Bus: 200MHz
Board: board name: 963169P-1861N5
External switch id = 53125
Main Thread: TP0
Memory Test Passed
Total Memory: 134217728 bytes (128MB)
Boot Address: 0xb8000000
